name: Bank N Forth - ZX Spectrum
description:
My Entry for the Crash Micro Action Issue 3

Criteria - game has to be written in BASIC and based on a sample piece of code supplied in that issue.

Idea of game - survive for a long as possible.  Press space to switch your craft around before hitting a wall.   The walls cave in on you at each move.   Once there is no space to move, you warp onto the next level.  Simples......   see how long you can survive.

Goto here to purchase the magazines 

https://fusionretrobooks.com/collections/crash-magazine
